title: 4: OBITCH It's a digital digital get down...
description:
In this week’s episode the duo chat famous last words, and answer the age old question: Does your hair and nails really continue to grow after death? We’ve got some questionable obituaries, and of course some dumbass criminals..one went out with a bang..you’ll see. 
Rate & Review on iTunes
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us! Obitpod@gmail.com
Sources: 
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/deborah-burns-fart-in-face-knife-fight_n_3244946
http://klinedentistry.com/happens-teeth-die/
https://www.sciencefocus.com/the-human-body/do-fingernails-and-hair-really-keep-growing-after-death/
https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20130526-do-your-nails-grow-after-death
https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/58534/64-people-and-their-famous-last-words
https://elvisdaily.com/2016/08/15/elvis-presleys-last-hours-august-16-1977/ See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
